# Portfolio Website Project

## Project Overview
Astro-based personal portfolio website with React components and Tailwind CSS.

## Tech Stack
- **Framework**: Astro 4.x
- **UI Library**: React 18.x  
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS 3.x
- **Content**: MDX for blog posts
- **Deployment**: GitHub Pages

## Progress
- [x] Initialize project structure
- [x] Create configuration files
- [x] Build components
- [x] Set up deployment workflow
- [ ] Deploy to GitHub Pages
- [ ] Customize content

## Key Features
- Dual theme system (light/dark)
- Seasonal effects (snow/rain)
- Blog with MDX support
- Performance optimized
- SEO ready
- Fully accessible

## Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run preview` - Preview production build

## Next Steps
1. Customize personal information in components
2. Add blog posts to `src/content/blog/`
3. Update social links and contact info
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages
5. Configure custom domain (optional)
